Labour market data

Showing data for 'employment' (30 results)

Clear

Refine results

Need an earlier release?

We moved them to The National Archives website, to keep this website as responsive as possible.

Please note: all historical data is still on this website.

  • A01: Summary of labour market statistics

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    Labour market statistics summary data tables

    Keywords: employment, jobs, unemployment, claimant count, benefits, redundancies, economic inactivity, earnings, labour disputes, vacancies

  • EMP04: Employment by occupation

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    Employment by Occupation. This spreadsheet is usually published once a year in August and provides a detailed snapshot of employment by occupation, broken down by sex. These estimates are sourced from the Labour Force Survey, a survey of households.

  • EMP08: All in employment by occupation

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    All in employment by occupation. This table is published four times a year in February, May, August and November. A more detailed employment by occupation spreadsheet, published once a year, is available at Table EMP04.

  • EMP13: Employment by industry

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    Employment by industry (Labour Force Survey). This table is updated four times a year in February, May, August and November.

  • JOBS04: Self-employment jobs by industry

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    Self-employment jobs by industry. This table is usually updated in March, June, September and December.

  • EMP03: Public sector employment by industry

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    Public sector employment by industry. This table is updated in March, June, September and December.

  • EMP05: Employment rate revisions triangle

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    Employment rate revisions triangle. These estimates are sourced from the Labour Force Survey, a survey of households.

  • EMP11: Employment by socio-economic classification

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    Employment by socio-economic classification. It is usually updated four times a year in February, May, August and November.

  • EMP02: Public and private sector employment

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    Public and private sector employment. This table is usually updated in March, June, September and December.

  • EMP06: Employment by country of birth and nationality

    Dataset | Released on 11 September 2018

    Employment levels and rates by country of birth and nationality. These estimates are usually updated in February, May, August and November.
